attributes.action: Withdrawal of the United Kingdom from the EU
attributes.additional_details:
The EU has spread economic catastrophe through its member states whilst the two richest countries in Europe have remained outside (Norway and Switzerland).  They are able to import from and export to the EU freely without being subjected to EU rules and ambitions.  The British people never taken on the opinion that the EU was or is necessary. Europe is in decline and Britain is being held back. It is time to break free.

We demand the Government arranges for an orderly withdrawal of the United Kingdom from the EU. This can be done either by Parliament or via a referendum.
